customer_name: David Grove Glenda Grove Eric Grove Adam Grove

citations.narrative:
The metal feeder for one adult dog contains a small area of caked feed and moldy food. Caked and contaminated food
may cause illness should the dog consume it.
Food must be uncontaminated, wholesome, palatable, and of sufficient quantity and nutritive value to maintain the normal
condition and weight of the animal. The licensee must remove the caked and moldy food from the dog's feeder and
ensure that any food items provided to the dogs are free of contamination and caking at all times.
To be corrected by: The licensee removed the caked and moldy food from the feeder at the time of the inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.9(a) 
   
Feeding 
The metal feeder for one adult dog contains a small area of caked feed and moldy food.  Caked and contaminated food 
may cause illness should the dog consume it.   
 
Food must be uncontaminated, wholesome, palatable, and of sufficient quantity and nutritive value to maintain the normal 
condition and weight of the animal.  The licensee must remove the caked and moldy food from the dog's feeder and 
ensure that any food items provided to the dogs are free of contamination and caking at all times. 
 
To be corrected by:  The licensee removed the caked and moldy food from the feeder at the time of the inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
